channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- libapreq2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- libapreq2

item.title: CVE-2022-22728|2024-08-03T03:21:49.039Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- libapreq2
item.description: A flaw in Apache libapreq2 versions 2.16 and earlier could cause a buffer overflow while processing multipart form uploads. A remote attacker could send a request causing a process crash which could lead to a denial of service attack.
